'''A "Tranquil" Day''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 5.5]].

==Event Duration==
March 26, 2025 – April 8, 2025 23:59 (UTC+8)

==Eligibility==
Travelers who have reached [[Adventure Rank]] 10 or above can participate in this event.

==Event Description==
During the event, Travelers can earn rewards including a total of Primogems ×80 by helping Varesa complete her training through the page guidance and unlocking her daily routine by completing in-game quests.
After completing each daily routine phase, Traveler must follow the quest hints to complete the designated "Area Exploration Quest" in-game to unlock the next daily routine phase.

==Area Exploration Quests==
# Go to the [[Collective of Plenty]] and [[indwell]] a [[Tatankasaurus]] once.
# Unlock the [[Statue of The Seven]] in the Collective of Plenty.
# Complete the [[World Quest]] "[[Path to the Flaming Peaks]]."
* Travelers can check the quest prompts on the event page for quick guidance on completing the quests.

==Event Rewards==
# Help Varesa complete her training through the page guidance to obtain Primogems ×20.
# Complete the Area Exploration Quests and unlock all of Varesa's daily routine to obtain: Primogems ×60, Mystic Enhancement Ore ×3, Sanctifying Unction ×3, Hero's Wit ×5, Mt. Mushroom (For One) ×1, Sparkless Statue Core ×5.
# Share the web event to community platforms to obtain Mora ×20,000
{{Card List|Primogem*80,Mystic Enhancement Ore*3,Sanctifying Unction *3,Hero's Wit*5, Mt. Mushroom (For One)*1,Sparkless Statue Core*5,Mora*20000|show_caption=1}}

==Notes==
* After the event ends, you will no longer be able to claim the rewards, so remember to take part in time.
* The in-game rewards will be distributed via in-game mail. The mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim the rewards in time.
* This web event is provided purely for entertainment. It is not indicative of any related gameplay features in Genshin Impact.
